Clash stood on top of the mountain he had crashed on, his hunger for power =
not yet satisfied. The mere 7 sparks sitting inside of him were not yet eno=
ugh, and he had to cacth more. What about that whiny brat that complained a=
nd bawled about him devouring her 2 comrades? He would have to hunt her dow=
n, but it would be worth it. He flies around searching the grounds for Tech=
nosis.

Technosis walks gently past the rubble of the base and continues on=
, with nobody in the world anymore, she blew wherever the wind took her now=
...
